properties.title: Domaine Simon Bize
properties.description: Iconic winery started by Simon Bize, suceeded by Patrick Bize, whose wife Chisa Bize and sister Marielle Bize are winemakers now.

properties.title: Domaine Comtes Lafon
properties.description: Iconic Meursault producer heralded by Dominique Lafon, joined by new generation Lea and Pierre Lafon.

properties.title: DOMAINE ARNAUD ENTE
properties.description: Arnaud and his wife, Marie-Odile, work primarily on their own to craft an exquisite range of micro-production white Burgundies from Meursault and Puligny-Montrachet. Precision, purity, elegance, and finesse are the best descriptors of the Ente style.

properties.title: Domaine Marquis d'Angerville
properties.description: Iconic Volnay producer with monopole Clos des Ducs

properties.title: Domaine Sylvain Pataille
properties.description: Iconic Marsannay producer who pioneered single-vineyard Aligote Dore bottling.

properties.title: Domaine Romanée Conti
properties.description: The most iconic Burgundy producer of all time, owned by Aubert de Vaillaine and Leroy families.

properties.title: Domaine Jean Grivot
properties.description: One of the iconic and pioneering domaines in Burgundy in 1980s
properties.address: 6 Rue de la Croix Rameau, 21700 Vosne-Romanée, France

properties.title: Domaine Raveneau
properties.description: The most iconic Chablis producer by Raveneau Francois.

properties.title: Domaine Hubert et Laurent Lignier
properties.description: One of the most iconic producers in Morey-Saint-Denis.
